text: Does anyone have advice for formatting PDFs in blog posts? My client wants these pdfs to be embedded and readable on phones.  (I think this is a terrible plan)

Not to. Most PDF's are pretty big and will impact both SEO + speed on phones. How about creating a workflow, or a form which sends the PDF to their inbox? This way they'll be able to add some more contacts to their database and not eat the data on their potential customers data plans :smile:
